name: Dungeon Stars
description: Dungeon Stars is an explosive evolution of a hack -n- slash dungeon crawler with addictive button-smashing action set in a world populated by lovable characters, a beautifully rich environment, and rapid progression.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: Dual-Core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX10 Storage: 1 GB available space
